channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins

item.title: CVE-2023-43497|2024-09-24T17:04:55.380Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: In Jenkins 2.423 and earlier, LTS 2.414.1 and earlier, processing file uploads using the Stapler web framework creates temporary files in the default system temporary directory with the default permissions for newly created files, potentially allowing attackers with access to the Jenkins controller file system to read and write the files before they are used.

item.title: CVE-2024-43045|2024-08-07T13:27:12.065Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.470 and earlier, LTS 2.452.3 and earlier does not perform a permission check in an HTTP endpoint, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to access other users' "My Views".

item.title: CVE-2024-43044|2024-08-07T13:27:11.438Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.470 and earlier, LTS 2.452.3 and earlier allows agent processes to read arbitrary files from the Jenkins controller file system by using the `ClassLoaderProxy#fetchJar` method in the Remoting library.

item.title: CVE-2024-43044|2024-08-07T17:29:40.580Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.470 and earlier, LTS 2.452.3 and earlier allows agent processes to read arbitrary files from the Jenkins controller file system by using the `ClassLoaderProxy#fetchJar` method in the Remoting library.

item.title: CVE-2024-43045|2024-08-07T17:45:05.211Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.470 and earlier, LTS 2.452.3 and earlier does not perform a permission check in an HTTP endpoint, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to access other users' "My Views".
